title: I enjoy the new Ashe.
body: That Q is so broken though, it does like 2.7k damage to the Dragon midgame.

replies.body: I do around 9k damage to your Nana on Sunday mornings.
Ashe seems to be dominating the ADCs nowadays...

LOL, you should try; {{item:3153}} , {{item:3085}} , {{item:3031}} ,{{item:3046}} ,  {{item:3087}} , {{item:3111}} 
she becomes an unstoppable goddess, 3v1? no fuss. Her q applies an instance of bork 5 times. Then on top of that runnanns arrows are 5 per hit, and we all know that they apply on hit effects, so again, another 5 instances of bork, and the best part is, its all counted in the instance of 1 aa, so each instance of bork isn't reduced until the next attack.

so just say they all have exactly 1k hp and you 1 aa at them with q applied that would be a total of 40% of their hp each (given they have no armor) so that would be about 1200 damage from just the bork proc alone

Ps. the onhit isn't supposed to go to the bonus arrows, but atm its bugging so it does
Pps. keep quiet of riot will nerf it to hell, and fix the op bug

>Her q applies an instance of bork 5 times

Good work being a retard.

Her Q applies on hit effects once.
did I mention the heal is unstoppable?
